code: import styles from"./AllAccounts.module.css";import AuthContext from"../store/auth-context";import{useContext}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AllAccounts=function AllAccounts(){var ctx=useContext(AuthContext);var users=ctx.users;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:styles["flex-wrap"],children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Table of All Users' Accounts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:styles["styled-table"],children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Customer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Account Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Balance"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:users.map(function(user){var attributes=user.attributes;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"".concat(attributes.firstName," ").concat(attributes.lastName)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"Checking"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:attributes.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:attributes.password}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:"$".concat(attributes.balance)})]},user);})})]})]});};export default AllAccounts;
